headline: BCA flags rising risk of Trump trade escalation by 2027
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. trade tensions are expected to remain relatively contained through 2026 before potentially escalating again in 2027, as political and legal constraints limit the scope for aggressive tariff hikes in the near term, according to a new report from BCA Research.

content.title: BCA flags rising risk of Trump trade escalation by 2027
